briefdescription.para: Add a friend to a friend list.

detaileddescription.para:
If or when a remote CardDAV server will be attached to the list, the friend will be sent to the server.
list
LinphoneFriendList object.
lf
LinphoneFriend object to add to the friend list.
LinphoneFriendListOK if successfully added, LinphoneFriendListInvalidFriend if the friend is not valid.

briefdescription.para: Add a friend to a friend list.

detaileddescription.para:
The friend will never be sent to a remote CardDAV server. Warning! LinphoneFriends added this way will be removed on the next synchronization, and the callback contact_deleted will be called.
list
LinphoneFriendList object.
lf
LinphoneFriend object to add to the friend list.
LinphoneFriendListOK if successfully added, LinphoneFriendListInvalidFriend if the friend is not valid.

briefdescription.para: Remove a friend from a friend list.

parameterdescription.para: LinphoneFriend object to remove from the friend list.

simplesect.para: LinphoneFriendListOK if removed successfully, LinphoneFriendListNonExistentFriend if the friend is not in the list.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the list of LinphoneFriend from this LinphoneFriendList.

simplesect.para: A list of LinphoneFriend objects. LinphoneFriend a list of LinphoneFriend

briefdescription.para: Find a friend in the friend list using a LinphoneAddress.

simplesect.para: A LinphoneFriend if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Find a friend in the friend list using an URI string.

parameterdescription.para: A string containing the URI of the friend we want to search for.

simplesect.para: A LinphoneFriend if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Find a friend in the friend list using a ref key.

parameterdescription.para: The ref key string of the friend we want to search for.

simplesect.para: A LinphoneFriend if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Update presence subscriptions for the entire list.

detaileddescription.para:
Calling this function is necessary when list subscriptions are enabled, ie when a RLS presence server is used.
list
the friend list

briefdescription.para: Notify our presence to all the friends in the friend list that have subscribed to our presence directly (not using a RLS).
